page.title: 02HODNET HALL GARDENS
page.content: Visit{Hodnet Hall Gardens}of delight and beauty in which to stroll and relax. Where lawns slope gently down to tranquil lakes and stately trees supply shade. Here time is measured in seasons - from drifts of daffodils in April to September's hydrangea blooms - and there are always flowers to please. Open April to the end of September. Weekdays: 2 p.m.- 5 p.m. Sundays, Bank Holiday Mondays and Tuesdays following: 12 noon to 6 p.m. Free car park. Tea rooms open Sundays and Bank Holidays during April and September and daily from May to August.{Gift shop,}and plants for sale in the kitchen garden. {Hodnet Hall}is situated 12 miles N.E.of{Shrewsbury}on the A53. Exit M6 at Junction 15. Organised parties catered for. ADMISSION Adults Â£1.20, Children 60p. Impact Information Ltd.
